item.title: Talks
item.description: Big Data Discover Pangeo Forge and how it can help us solve complex problems in climate and weather research here with Ryan Abernathey. JupyterCon 2020: Ryan Abernathey on Cloud Native Repositories for Big Scientific Data at this link OceanCloud: Transforming oceanography with a new approach to data and computing by Ryan Abernathey link Machine Learning for Physics discovery One World Mathematics presentation: Climate Modeling in the Age of Machine Learning - Laure Zanna
